title: Kylie Jenner promotes her sister Kim Kardashian's shapewear line for her birthday
text:
Kim Kardashian is celebrating her 39th birthday today, and little sister Kylie Jenner wasted no time to hop on board and do some promoting her big sister's line, Skims.

On Monday afternoon, the 22-year-old makeup mogul shared to her Instagram some clips of her wearing the shapewear line.

Kylie made sure to show off her toned curves as she rocked the slimming sets in honor of the reality star's special day.

Birthday set: Kylie Jenner shared to her Instagram some clips of her wearing the shapewear line, Skims

Looking good: She showed off her toned body in the thing shapewear set in support of her big sister's birthday

In the clip, Kylie wore the nude bra and and matching legwear as she worked the camera while posing in the mirror.

She had her long nails painted a light pink and her signature long brunette hair long.

Kylie later showed her face which showed the young mother-of-one in a full face of makeup and dramatic winged eyeliner.

Lounge day: In the clip, Kylie wore the nude bra and and matching legwear as she worked the camera while posing in the mirror

Before Kylie flaunted her figure, she shared a throwback photo of her and Kim titling today as 'Kim Day.'

For today only, it seems as though the Kardashian klan is knocking all Kim Kardashian products down by 39% to celebrate her new age.

This includes her Skims bras which are $39, her KKW beauty must-haves have been marked down, as well as her collaboration collection with Kylie.

Sisters: Before Kylie flaunted her figure, she shared a throwback photo of her and Kim titling today as 'Kim Day'

While Kim's birthday may be today, she celebrated with her friends and family over the weekend.

The star had a small party with her friends and family over the weekend, and got her glam done by none other than Kylie.

'So for my birthday, I have a special makeup artist today,' she said in the Instagram video showing off Kylie.

The party seemed lowkey with just a long dinner table, 'happy birthday' napkins, paper hats, and two large bouquet of flowers.
description: Kylie Jenner wasted no time to hop on board and do some promoting her big sister's line.On Monday , the makeup mogul shared to her Instagram clips of her wearing the shapewear line.
